content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite accommodating. So, what price were you considering for the rental?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate your time and the opportunity to discuss the apartment. Regarding the price, I was hoping to find a reasonable offer that suits both our needs. Could you provide me with your initial price proposal?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Certainly, Max. I believe a fair price for this luxurious apartment would be 1200 Euro per month. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your offer, Mister Schmidt. I'll consider it and let you know if I can agree to that price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: No problem, Max. Please take your time to think it over. If you have any other questions or need more time, feel free to ask.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I do have a question. Is there any possibility of negotiating the price lower?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: As a landlord, I am always open to negotiations. However, the price I've offered is based on the high demand for such apartments in the city center. Nevertheless, if you can convince me that a lower price is justified, I'm willing to listen. What price were you thinking of?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Mister Schmidt. I was hoping to get the price down to 1100 Euro per month. I believe this would be a fair compromise, considering the current market conditions. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, your offer is indeed lower than what I had in mind. However, considering the prime location and the new construction, I'm willing to accept your offer of 1100 Euro per month. I agree to the price of 1100 Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Excellent news, Mister Schmidt! I'm very pleased with the agreement. TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
